name: Slurp Fighters
description:
An epic platform shooter for up to 8 players online or local. Try matchmaking or inviting friends to a custom room. And it's free! Play cross-platform players on Android and IOS. Frequent updates, with 3 characters and different customization options with both of more to come!


Here's what you can expect from Slurp Fighters.

Weekly patches and updates.

Online, custom, local play modes.

3 Characters (with more to come) to chose from.

Loads of stages to fight on.

Unique stats and weapons for each character. 

A constant stream of new features, balance tweaks and Characters to make the game better and better.

Excited Devs active everywhere eagerly listening to what you think! Our eternal thanks (you're our favorite).
